attributes.action: Change the National Anthem to "Agadoo" by Black Lace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long now, people have dismissed the true meaning of the lyrics. Unity + togetherness, patriotism + pride is what the song's all about. So come on people, lets scrap God save the Queen and sing along to the sound of pineapple trees as we jump up and down to the hula melody!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
